CustomField.description: Who is the Sales Development Rep for this Account? Formula field that looks at Account Owner.
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( Account_Owner_Name__c="Chris Kessler", Account_Owner_Name__c="Peter Shaw", Account_Owner_Name__c="Greg Giblin"), "Adam Nelson",
IF( OR( Account_Owner_Name__c="Rod Fleck", Account_Owner_Name__c="John Sharkey", Account_Owner_Name__c="Chase Adams"), "Lori Hamel",
IF( OR( Account_Owner_Name__c="Adam Friedman", Account_Owner_Name__c="Marin Sardelic", Account_Owner_Name__c="Pam Snyder"), "Holly Stirk",
IF( OR( Account_Owner_Name__c="Aimee Spirlin", Account_Owner_Name__c="Michael Johnston"), "Paul Talaga",
IF( Simple_Territory__c = "EMEA", "Sadou Diallo",
IF( OR( Account_Owner_Name__c="Bill Pintsak", Account_Owner_Name__c="Bryan Roberts", Account_Owner_Name__c="Emma Sarson", Account_Owner_Name__c="Michelle Inferri-Tauss", Account_Owner_Name__c="Steve Davis"), "Dan Hermann",
"Jeff Macomber"))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Who is the Sales Development Rep for this Account?
CustomField.label: Sales Development Rep TO BE DEPRECATED
